io.sarl.lang.core

Class Behavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.Behavior

  • public abstract class Behavior
extends Object
    A behavior maps a collection of perceptions represented by events to a collection of a task.

    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: srodriguez$
